sectionApp.title: Are you afraid to miss the speaker agenda of interest?
sectionApp.subtitle: Download the MOPCON App and build your calendar!

schedule.desc: MOPCON It is now the largest technical community seminar in South Taiwan. It was established to link industry and information engineering technology to cultivate more information technology talents and promote the innovation and development of Kaohsiung industry. Without the support of partners, this vision will not come true. ! Thank you for joining us in the past 7 years. Together with us, we will gather talents and knowledge from South Taiwan to grow and learn together!

levelDesc.normal: E_歡迎略懂，有基礎的會眾
levelDesc.expert: E_建議在該領域中有研究經驗的人入場
